Time Base Location Base Help Info Share More Apps Rate Us End Profile Start Profile Profiler Created date Profile Thanks for installing this app. By using this application you will able to silent, ringing, vibrate and can set profile volumes as well as touch, dial pad sound enable/disable of device. user can add new profiles and then select for location based profiler/time based profiler. if time based profiler is set then sound profile changes sounds of device when time alarm triggers. if location base profiler is set then sound profile change sound of device when user Enter/exit selected area on map. Are you sure you want to
 exit? Thanks for using our app for further suggestion please give us your feedback send us email at(abc@gmail.com). Close Thank you for using our app. Exit Automatically manage your sound profile This application asks user to allow certain permissions that are required for the application to perform its actions properly. (Profile Changer) helps user to silent, ringing,vibrate and can set profile volumes as well as touch, dial pad sound enable/disable of device.user can add new profiles and then select for location based profiler/time based profiler.if time based profiler is set then sound profile changes sounds of device when time alarm triggers.if location base profiler is set then sound profile changes sounds of device when user enter/exit selected area on map.We insure you that the user personal data or information is not collected by the company nor does the application host users data 1. Location permission needed to check if user is entered and exit or not.

2. Do Not Disturb permission is required to change ringing mode and enable do not disturb mode.

3. Manage System settings is required to enable/disable touch, dial pad and vibrate By accepting you are agree to our Terms and Conditions Terms And Conditions
